column2: the butter crust is absolutely delicious. Probably my favorite deep dish crust I've ever had
column3: and I was pretty in love with Patxi's (in California) version. This version is sweet and flaky
column4: almost like half crust and half pastry. Unfortunately though
column6: it got a bit soggy. I thought it was the moisture from the tomatoes
column7: but from reading others' similar reviews it sounds like the mozzarella is so moist that it bleeds into the crust and doesn't keep it crispy. I didn't mind it terribly
